title: React Developer
tasks: Designed, Developed, and tested the web application using cutting-edge web development tech- nologies like ReactJS, Redux, React Router, HTML5, CSS3, Jest, Enzyme, Bootstrap, etc.
Collaborated with Product, Engineering and UX teams to explore new feature ideas, workflows and disambiguated requirements to create the appropriate interfaces.
Implemented responsive design and ensured cross-browser compatibility using CSS3 features such as media query.
Used Redux to store data globally and for easy retrieval of data to any component in the web application.
Utilized the concepts of functional programming and OOP to develop UI components that could be reused across the SPA.
Implemented Middleware configurations and Redux Promises in the SPA to fetch data from the back end and to consume RESTful services.
Fulfilled responsive web development, including building grids by using Bootstrap components such as dropdown menus, navigation bar, alerts, labels, etc.
Followed Test Driven Development (TDD) for component-based and unit testing with Jest and Enzyme, and end to end testing using Cypress.
Used versioning tools such as Git to collaborate with peer engineers.
Actively participated in Agile and Scrum workflow.

title: Front-End Developer
tasks: Designed, implemented, modified and tested engaging, consumer-facing web experiences using modern JavaScript technology stack.
Translated system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment.
Delivered scalable production-ready code for new and existing features of the web application using ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React Router, Redux, Ajax, etc.
Designed CSS templates that could be reused on the web pages across the website using CSS concepts such as background, margin, padding, table, etc.
Worked on popular React components such as state, specs, props, and events to achieve interactive web experience.
Used React Router to enhance user experience in the web application using browser history features.
Coped with states within the web application using Redux and enabled certain parts of the states to persist through Redux Persist.
Implemented modules in NodeJS to integrate with requirements for web designs.
Built and broadly tested RESTful APIs by using Express and NodeJS.
Ran diagnostic tests, repaired defects, and provided technical support using Jest and Enzyme.
Used Git for version control throughout the development process.
Participated in the Agile process, monthly Sprints, daily Scrums, and A/B testing to propel the development of the project.

title: UI Developer
tasks: Responsible for developing the web application that matches requirements of the client using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, etc.
Effectively coordinated with peer engineers throughout the development process and ensured that all requirements were satisfied and documented properly.
Extensively involved in design discussion and user-experience sessions to provide input on the layout and UX.
Developed functional HTML5 and CSS3 pages from the mock-ups and involved in UI review with the UI architect and Business Units.
Developed GUI using JavaScript, HTML5, AJAX, CSS3 and jQuery in the ongoing projects.
Distilled hand-written HTML, CSS 2/3, JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax, XML, and JSON code from the mock-ups.
Developed the user authentication and order processing modules for customer facing components.
Participated in requirements definition and story carding.
